them weave in ends and soak mitts in lukewarm water with your favourite wool wash gently squeeze them dry in a towel put the wet mitts on to evenly distribute the floats carefully remove them and then pin them out to dry fully you want to stretch the slipped stitch area lengthwise as much as possible while the mitts are wet and then pin it in place so it dries the same length as the other stitch patterns do your best not to stretch the other areas enjoy your awesome new mitts thanks so much for knitting my pattern please visit www emmaknits net for more all text and images copyright emma
